text.146_Chapter, 1_Verse: The Lord is the builder of Jerusalem; He will gather the outcasts of Israel.
text.59_Chapter, 12_Verse: Give us aid against the adversary, but the salvation of man is futile.
text.124_Chapter, 1_Verse: Jerusalem has mountains around it, and the Lord is around His people from now and to eternity.
text.59_Chapter, 13_Verse: Through God we shall gather might, and He will trample our adversaries. (yevus tsareinu)
text.131_Chapter, 4_Verse: Until I find a place for the Lord, dwellings for the Mighty One of Jacob.
text.59_Chapter, 11_Verse: Is it not You, O God, Who has forsaken us, and [Who] does not go forth, O God, with our hosts?
text.119_Chapter, 0_Verse: A song of ascents. In my distress I called to the Lord, and He answered me.
text.67_Chapter, 29_Verse: From Your Temple, which is over Jerusalem, kings will bring You tribute.
text.124_Chapter, 0_Verse: A song of ascents. Those who trust in the Lord are like Mount Zion, which will not falter but will abide forever.
text.132_Chapter, 2_Verse: As the dew of Hermon which runs down on the mountains of Zion, for there the Lord commanded the blessing, life forever.
text.101_Chapter, 21_Verse: That men may declare the name of the Lord in Zion, And His praise in Jerusalem.
text.50_Chapter, 19_Verse: With Your will, do good to Zion; build the walls of Jerusalem.
text.75_Chapter, 2_Verse: His Tabernacle was in Shalem, and His dwelling place in Zion.
text.121_Chapter, 5_Verse: Request the welfare of Jerusalem; may those who love you enjoy tranquility.
text.47_Chapter, 2_Verse: The fairest of branches, the joy of the entire earth- Mount Zion, by the north side, the city of a great king.
text.59_Chapter, 10_Verse: Who will bring me to a fortified city?-He Who led me to Edom?
text.78_Chapter, 0_Verse: A song of Asaph. O God! Nations have come into Your heritage, they have defiled Your Holy Temple, they have made Jerusalem into heaps.
text.131_Chapter, 5_Verse: Behold we heard it in Ephrath; we found it in the fields of the forest.
text.133_Chapter, 0_Verse: A song of ascents. Behold, bless the Lord, all servants of the Lord who stand in the house of the Lord at night.
text.136_Chapter, 0_Verse: By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat, we also wept when we remembered Zion.
text.47_Chapter, 1_Verse: The Lord is great and very much praised, in the city of our God, the Mount of His Sanctuary.
text.101_Chapter, 16_Verse: When the Lord has built up Zion, when He has appeared in His glory
text.47_Chapter, 0_Verse: A song, a psalm of the sons of Korah.
text.10_Chapter, 2_Verse: For when the foundations are destroyed; what has the righteous man done?
text.47_Chapter, 3_Verse: God is in its palaces; He is known as a stronghold.
text.45_Chapter, 4_Verse: But as for the river-its rivulets shall cause the city of God, the holy place of the dwellings of the Most High, to rejoice.
text.1_Chapter, 5_Verse: But I have enthroned My king on Zion, My holy mount.
text.49_Chapter, 1_Verse: From Zion, the finery of beauty, God appeared.
text.131_Chapter, 12_Verse: For the Lord has chosen Zion; He desired it for His habitation.
text.136_Chapter, 4_Verse: If I forget you, O Jerusalem, may my right hand forget [its skill].
text.29_Chapter, 0_Verse: A psalm; a song of dedication of the House, of David.
text.98_Chapter, 1_Verse: The Lord is great in Zion, and He is high over all the peoples.
text.127_Chapter, 4_Verse: May the Lord bless you from Zion, and see the good of Jerusalem all the days of your life.
text.59_Chapter, 9_Verse: Moab is my washbasin; on Edom I will throw my lock; Philistia, join me.
text.134_Chapter, 20_Verse: Blessed is the Lord from Zion, He Who dwells in Jerusalem. Hallelujah!
text.64_Chapter, 1_Verse: Silence is praise to You, O God in Zion, and to You a vow is paid
text.133_Chapter, 2_Verse: May the Lord bless you from Zion, He Who made heaven and earth.
text.71_Chapter, 15_Verse: May there be an abundance of grain in the land, on the mountain peaks; may its fruit rustle like Lebanon, and they will blossom forth from the city like the grass of the earth.
text.86_Chapter, 2_Verse: Glorious things are said about you, the city of God, forever.
